title: Decoding Deepfakes: Truth in the Age of AI
summary: We explore the technology behind deepfakes, their potential for misuse in misinformation campaigns, and what's being done to combat them.

title: The Ransomware Epidemic: Protecting Your Digital Life
summary: A deep dive into how ransomware attacks work, who they target, and the critical steps you can take to prevent becoming a victim.

title: Guest Talk: The Ethics of Algorithmic Hiring
summary: Special guest Dr. Eva Rostova discusses the pros and cons of using AI in the hiring process and the potential for reinforcing systemic biases.
